title: Win a Kona Rove LTD Frame and Support Children of Incarcerated Parents
content:
Radar

Want to win a 54cm 2021 Kona Rove LTD frame + fork and help an amazing cause at the same time?

Buy your raffle tickets here for $10 each at Behind Bars bike shop’s site.

Behind Bars in Minneapolis is trying to raise money for Adventure Camp which is the Loppet Foundation’s flagship summer program. Every summer, kids ages 9-13 gather at Theodore Wirth Park for a week of outdoor activities. Counselors teach them mountain biking, orienteering, archery, and other skills. There’s also plenty of time for fun and games, like capture the flag and ultimate frisbee.

One in six Minnesota youth has experienced parental incarceration. These children are “hidden victims” – “victims of the criminal justice system who are neither acknowledged nor given a platform to be heard.”  Providing 30 of these youth with the opportunity to attend adventure camp will not only give them a week of fun, it will provide a community of children who have also experienced parental incarceration.

Stay tuned with Behind Bars for more raffles for good causes.
